product.name: Girls One Piece Swimsuits Hawaiian Ruffle Swimwear Beach Bathing Suit
product.description: The perfect swimwear for girls! Enjoy the summer, enjoy the beach! Great gift for your little girls!

reviews.reviewText: “Great fit and look. My daughter loved it for our trip Hawaii. Well made as well!”
“My daughter is 7 years old, 50% height and weight. Size 7-8 is perfect for her with a little room to grow into. No need to buy one size up.”
“Bathing suit fit perfectly. I was skeptical of buying a swimsuit online that went by ages instead of sizes, but it actually fits.”

features.title: PREMIUM QUALITY ASSURE
features.description: Our trendy cute swimsuit for girls is made of 80% Polyamide and 20% Elastane. High elastic spandex offers enough space for a growing child.

features.title: FUNCTIONAL DESIGN,ADORABLE PATTERN
features.description: This fantastic girls swimsuit is professional designed for functional use. Soft fabric for kid's sensitive skin and durable for best results.

features.title: ALL DAY SUN PROTECTION
features.description: High-tech material with SPF 50,provide this swimwear for toddlers and girls swimsuit ultimate, secure protection for little swimmers.

banner.label: Hot!
banner.description: We make all our girls swimwear with special quality attention to detail. Purchase Now for $18 USD.

callout.centralText: Start using that in your next Hawaii trips

questionsPart1.title: How do refunds work?
questionsPart1.answer: Open a refund request with us and we can work with you to resolve it ASAP.

questionsPart1.title: Can I pay using AMEX?
questionsPart1.answer: Yes, we accept all major credit cards, including AMEX, so rack up those points!

questionsPart1.title: My daughter normally wears 14/16 size should i get her?
questionsPart1.answer: I ordered size 4 for my 3 year old. She is taking swim lessons and wears a swim diaper so that takes up a bit of room, without the diaper size 4 would be too large. Very cute bathing suit.

questionsPart2.title: True to size?
questionsPart2.answer: Yes. Bought for my granddaughter who was wearing 3T and it was a great fit.

questionsPart2.title: Does it have any bodice lining to cover nipples?
questionsPart2.answer: Not sure if it does but the inside of it has a white lining type of cloth. My 12 year old daughter says that it's not see thru. And she said that it covers her stuff. Hope this helps.
